document.full_text: world number two novak djokovic stretched his unbeaten run this year to 25 matches after reaching the serbia open third round with a 6-2 6-3 win over romanian adrian ungur on wednesday.
document.title: djokovic strolls into serbia open third round
lines_and_colors: world number two novak djokovic stretched his unbeaten run this year to 25 matches after reaching the serbia open third round with a 6-2 6-3 win over romanian adrian ungur on wednesday.
